title: 107_hr3232
content: Voting Equipment Compatibility With Instant Runoff Voting Act of 2001 - Establishes a program under which the Federal Election Commission shall make grants to eligible States to defray the costs of administering an instant runoff voting system adopted for presidential elections, including the costs of purchasing voting equipment, software, and other technology necessary for such a system. Requires each State to administer elections for Federal office using voting equipment and technology compatible with an instant runoff voting system.
